Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: Sure! Here's the 50-word summary in a trendy tone:

Title: People are speaking up on social media calling on the Federal Government to act on the Economic Inclusion Advisory Committee's report recommendations and #RaisetheRate. According to these voices current payments entrench people in poverty and must be addressed in this budget. The people's message is clear: provide enough support so they can cover the cost of essentials. #auspol
